#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int arr[2001]={0}, i,j, carry=0, store, sum=0, a, b;
	scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
	arr[2000] = 1;
	for (i=1; i<=b; i++)
	{
        carry=0;
        for (j=2000; j>=0; j--)
        {
            store = arr[j]*a + carry; 
            arr[j] = store%10;
            carry = (store)/10;
        }
    } 
    
    for (i=0; i<=2000; i++)
        if (arr[i]!=0) break;
        
    for (j=i; j<=2000; j++)
    {printf("%d", arr[j]); sum += arr[j];}
    
    printf("\n%d", sum);
    
    
	return 0;
}
